name: three stories from space
description:
this game was made for enui for bitsy secret santa 2021! the prompts i was given to make this game were "INSIDE," "SPACE," and "CRAFT."

content warnings: the first story includes some themes of self-destruction or self-destructive tendencies, unhealthy relationship dynamics, and abandonment. while these are themes of the first story, they are not really discussed at length. the second story includes brief mention of death.

controls: press the right arrow key to play. just keep pressing the right arrow key to progress through the game.

the game features three short stories from inside three different space crafts.

music credits:
serenity by prod. riddiman

audio added using candle's add bitsy audio tool
